headline: Stryker introduces Mako Handheld Robotics with the limited market release of Mako RPS
summary: Stryker (NYSE: SYK), a global leader in medical technologies, announced the limited market release of Mako RPS (Robotic Power System) for Total Knee, an intuitive handheld robotic system that combines Stryker's proven robotics and power tool legacies and represents Mako's expansion into a new robotics platform. Mako now includes Mako SmartRobotics™ – Stryker's multi-specialty, robotic-arm assisted platform featuring Mako 4 – and Mako Handheld Robotics with Mako RPS, which is designed to reach a
